main.name: Damilola Faseun
main.description: A full-stack web developer based in Lagos Nigeria.
main.bio: I am a creative front-end developer. I use JavaScript and React to create highly interactive and user friendly web experience.  After obtaining my degree in Electrical engineer, I took up a trainee position as an electrical engineer and worked briefly in the media industry, a friend of mine introduced me programming and recommended the online learning platform 'freecodecamp.com'. I found in programming a passion that encourages me to be innovative and allows me to express my creativity.  I have a keen intrest in web development and always try to think out of the box. I like learning new things and keeping up with industry trends and advancements.
main.contactmessage: I am currently available for work. Get in touch.

address.street: 5 Alh. Adijat Lawal Cl, Mafoluku Oshodi

resume.skillmessage1: I am highly interested in frontend development, building clean and interactive user interfaces that run accross all devices using frontend technologies like HTML5, CSS3, Javascript(ReactJs).
resume.skillmessage2: I also have hand-on experience developing full-stack application with NodeJs using modern database system like MongoDB and REST API for the backend.

education.school: Obafemi Awolowo University, Ile-ife, Osun State

work.title: Production Assistant
work.description: Scripted Optics are media content providers such as documentaries, informercials, training videos, television programmes etc. for public and private. I was responsible for collecting and managing assets needed in the production proceess and collaborating with producers so as to deliver accurate content and a streamlined workflow.

work.title: Graduate Engineer Trainee
work.description: Involved in planning and execution of several projects such as installation of a 100kVA distribution transformer. Evaluated design ideas to meet client requirements and implemented distibution systems for electrical wiring of new buildings.

work.title: Student Engineer Intern
work.description: Ensured safe working practices in the oil blending plant by coordinating job safety analysis for production line operators. Collaborated with senior engineers and technicians to performe corrective and preventive maintenance of manufacturing equipments to improve production yeild.

work.title: Intern
work.description: Operate, maintain, troubleshoot and repair of molding equipment used in the production of plastics. Responsible for weighing and storage of raw materials.
